description:
The students have 10 minutes to escape the building during the evacuation drill on pain of expulsion! Also, the student council elections are in one week!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Evacuation Drills Come Without Warning / Party of Fools
Hinankunren wa Totsuzen ni / Shiremonodomo no Kyouen
避難訓練は突然に / 痴れ者どもの狂宴
